title: NPM : Create account in Npm
mainDescription: Login to https://www.npmjs.com and create an account if you do not have already

title: NPM : Add user to local
mainDescription: With the account creation done. Go to the project you want to publish and do : npm adduser
This will prompt for username/password/email. Fill in and the user would be added in .npmrc .

title: NPM : Publish
mainDescription: To publish first we need to push the project to github. Once done. Type: npm publish . Voila. Its done.
For confirmation go and find the package on https://www.npmjs.com and it would be available.

title: NPM : Publish Update
mainDescription: Consider you have done some minor updates to the project.
That's it the patch version will be updated.
Similarly we can update the major or minor versions depending on our change.
